entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collaboration model proposal #37786
  • Quarantining `BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works` #37782
  • Change the log level for static web assets to Minimal #37779
  • .NET 6 exception incorrectly refers to startup and ConfigureServices #37778
    6.0.x
  • [.NET 6] Blazor cannot find member named xxx while debugging #37777
  • Question: Does RCL support changing wwwroot path? #37775
  • QUESTION: CustomModelBinder does not work on properties of the Dto/ViewModel #37774
  • Hot-Reload in VS very slow; but very fast with dotnet watch #37773
  • Blazor Tip: using Javascript in a more structured way by using extension methods #37772
  • SignalR doesn't always display content when rendering a page in Blazor Server #37771

Closed

  • Blazor app won't compile due to auto-generated __Blazor namespaces #36326
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Problem with razor code generation with named tuples #37209
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor generates code that doesn't compile when using generic components and RenderFragments #31263
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Need to custom the tag's close type in the Blazor. #37303
    .NET 7 Planning
  • @functions block in .razor file loses all language support if preceded by an unmatched < #37301
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Indefinite NullPointerException in Razor #37269
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor compiler `Unclosed div` within `@if` #24907
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Resolve failing full framework tests with incremental RSG #33796
    6.0-docs-infra
  • TestServer HttpClient isn't able to handle redirect to external url #37742
    Backlog
  • Update the compiler version referenced by Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor #36682
    6.0.0
  • Deflake port binding tests #27401
    Next sprint planning
  • Flaky test: Libuv.BindTests ListenAnyIP_IPv6_Success #25403
    Backlog
  • Quarantined test: RegisterIPEndPoint_DynamicPort_Success(endPoint: [::]:0, testUrl: "http://127.0.0.1") #26626
    Next sprint planning
  • Flaky test: ServerShutsDownWhenMainExitsStress #28994
    Next sprint planning
  • AddressRegistrationTests are unreliable #33204
    Next sprint planning
  • Blazor: Changes in a dependent project do not trigger a recompile. #37722
  • Blazor WASM - Lazy Loading and Dependency Injection #37695

PullRequests

Created

  • Update ua-parser-js #37785
    area-signalr
  • Quarantine `BlazorWasmHostedTemplate_AzureActiveDirectoryTemplate_Works` #37783
    area-mvc
  • Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37781
    area-signalr
  • [SPA] Updates npm dependencies #37776
    area-mvc
  • Replace NoHotReloadListenersAreOrdinarilyRegistered with unit tests #37768
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Reuse NegotiateMetadata #36184
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix typo in Web API template option description #37780
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions (#37663) #37764
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Continue using HashCodeCombiner in Razor.Language #37725
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #37696
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable retry for bind tests #37754
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #37755
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Helix] Switch to win11 for pr checks #37712
    area-infrastructure
  • Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
    area-infrastructure
